text:
Hmm~...
thinking about what to talk about on stage...

I see...
Don't worry, just be yourself.

Thank you. But... I want to say something
that will stay in everyone's hearts...

Yeah, how about trying to speak Haruki's
sincere words straight from the heart?

"If my song reflects in your clear eyes
and resonates in your heart..."

"If I can change even a little of the color of your heart...
then my presence here has meaning."

"...That's why I stand here,
hoping for that to happen."

...! It just came to mind suddenly...
Would something like this be okay?
